sections.heading: Definitions of certain words when used in pleadings1-217
sections.text: Definitions of certain words when used in pleadingsIn pleadings, civil or criminal:1. "Horse" includes all kinds, ages and sexes of the horse species.2. "Mule" includes all kinds, ages and sexes of the mule species.3. "Neat animal" includes al
